articles.author: Charles Q. Choi
articles.title: What's the difference between a llama and an alpaca? - Live Science
articles.description: Llamas are closely related to alpacas, so how can you tell these South American camelids apart?
articles.content:
It's easy to mistake llamas and alpacas for each other: Both are slender fluffy four-legged mammals with long necks that live in herds. So what's the difference between these two species?
